journal2ebook depends on imagemagick, ghostscript, and k2pdfopt. 

To use journal2ebook install the dependencies as follows:

install imagemagick
http://www.imagemagick.org/script/binary-releases.php#windows

install ghostscript
http://www.ghostscript.com/download/

install k2pdfopt or add it to the path of journal2ebook
http://www.willus.com/k2pdfopt/


Finally, run journal2ebook.py!
